logout.title: Logged out
logout.body: You have been logged out succesfully. Redirecting to the home page

cashFlow.title: Your cash flow
cashFlow.body1: Here you can check your cash flow between two specified dates.
cashFlow.body2: Down there, you will see a pie chart showing how the incomes/spendings fare to each other.
cashFlow.body3: If you want, you can create an excel file by clicking the button below.

card.specificDateBody: Take a look at your {{typeEN}} between two dates
card.thisWeekBody: Take a quick look at your {{typeEN}} this week.
card.thisMonthBody: Take a quick look at your {{typeEN}} this month.
card.allTimeBody: Take a quick look at your all-time {{typeEN}}.

home.body1: Have you ever wondered, where your hard earned money go? Was it always hard for you to keep track on your incomes and spendings?
home.body2: Are you saving up for something, and want to keep track on that? Try this app!
home.body3: It has all the features, a money tracker app must have, and very easy to use.
home.regCardBody: Don't have an account yet? Register here.
home.loginCardBody: Log in here, if you already have an account.

income.title: Your income history
income.body1: Here, you can save your incomes, and check them time to time.
income.body2: You can list them by dates, edit them, delete them, etc..
income.body3: There is even a pie chart on the right side of the datatable! Check that out!

profile.title: User details
profile.body: By clicking on the edit button next to the categories, you can set the category to enabled or disabled

savings.title: Your savings
savings.body1: Here, you can create savings, and check them time to time.
savings.body2: Are you saving up for something?
savings.body3: Or just want to take a look, at your previous savings?
savings.body4: Check below, how are you doing with your savings!

spendings.title: Your spending history
spendings.body1: Here, you can save your spendings, and check them time to time.
spendings.body2: You can list them by dates, edit them, delete them, etc..
spendings.body3: There is even a pie chart on the right side of the datatable! Check that out!
spendings.willSpendMore: Based on your previous month, you are going to spend {{amount}} more money this month.
spendings.notGonnaSpend: Based on your previous month, you are not going to spend any more money this month.

hint.editCategory: What is the title of this category?
hint.catHex: What is the hex color of this category?
hint.incomeName: What is the source of this income?
hint.spendingName: What have you spent your money for?
hint.date: Date of your {{typeEN}}. If empty, current date gets saved.
hint.savingName: Unique name for what you are saving up for

modal.loginError2: Something went wrong during your login process. You might try again.
modal.loginError3: If the error consists, try contacting one of our administrators.
modal.regError1: Something went wrong during your registration process. You might try again with a different username.
modal.regError2: If the error consists, try contacting one of our administrators.
modal.regUsernameError2: The username you have provided is already taken, try using an other.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: What can I do on this page?
faq.a1: On this page, you can manage your spendings, incomes, savings, and get a quick look at how you are doing so far in a specified period.
faq.q2: Do I have to register to use this page?
faq.a2: Yes, only registered users have full access to the page's functionality.
faq.q3: What if I have problems using this page?
